Question.Subject: How safe is to purchase e.book/courses on internet that offer 100% money back guarantee?
Question.Content: Is it true? I have been told that is just another scam and that they won't be bothered to even reply to your refund request...
Question.ChosenAnswer: If the payment method is via Click-bank they tend to have a 60 day refund policy no questions asked. I recently bought 2 courses off the net and paid via credit card through click-bank and found they were not what I really wanted so claimed my money back. All was refunded within a couple of days.

Answer.Content: Has scam written all over it.

If the payment method is via Click-bank they tend to have a 60 day refund policy no questions asked. I recently bought 2 courses off the net and paid via credit card through click-bank and found they were not what I really wanted so claimed my money back. All was refunded within a couple of days.
